title: The Farmer's Flail
description: Triston's life on his farm was hard work, yet serene. That was, until tragedy stuck and left him with nothing. It is also in this moment that he learns of his father's past and how it will be his future. Meanwhile, Jevetin, King of Eastern Triton, follows in his own father's footsteps in continuing the war against Western Triton. The mad man of a king begins his plans against the new champion knight of Western Triton, Triston... Facing an enemy that does not seem to feel pain and is seemingly as strong as two or three men, can Triston and his team of warriors from the other allied countries escape the mad Jevetin?
author: Troy Depue
